Introduction.title: Git — Introduction
Introduction.body: Git is a distributed version control system.

Theory.title: Git — Theory
Theory.body: Branches, commits, merging, and rebasing are core Git concepts.
Theory.code:
git checkout -b feature/awesome
git add .
git commit -m "feat: add awesome feature"

Interview Questions.title: Git — Interview Questions
Interview Questions.body:
Q: Difference between merge and rebase?
A: Merge preserves history; rebase rewrites it.
